articles.description: L&T buyback price: Floor price of the offer has been fixed at  ₹3,200 apiece, around 10% higher from LT share price today
articles.content: L&T buyback: The engineering and infrastructure coglomerate Larsen & Turbo (L&T) has declared buyback of shares that will open on 18th September 2023 i.e. on Monday next week. This Larsen… [+3240 chars]
